gtsummary 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Tutorials
    • tbl_summary()
    • tbl_regression()
  • News

Adds a column showing a label for the summary statistics shown in each row

add_stat_label.Rd

Rather than simply printing the summary statistics, with the use of add_stat_label(), a column labeling the summary statistics is added.

add_stat_label(x, iqr = TRUE)

Arguments

x

object with class tbl_summary from the tbl_summary function
iqr

logical indicator whether 'p25, p75' should resolve to 'IQR'. Default is TRUE

Examples

mtcars %>% tbl_summary() %>% add_stat_label()
#> <style>html {
#>   font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', Arial, sans-serif;
#> }
#> 
#> #ljamkajowk .gt_table {
#>   display: table;
#>   border-collapse: collapse;
#>   margin-left: auto;
#>   margin-right: auto;
#>   color: #000000;
#>   font-size: 16px;
#>   background-color: #FFFFFF;
#>   /* table.background.color */
#>   width: auto;
#>   /* table.width */
#>   border-top-style: solid;
#>   /* table.border.top.style */
#>   border-top-width: 2px;
#>   /* table.border.top.width */
#>   border-top-color: #A8A8A8;
#>   /* table.border.top.color */
#> }
#> 
#> #ljamkajowk .gt_heading {
#>   background-color: #FFFFFF;
#>   /* heading.background.color */
#>   border-bottom-color: #FFFFFF;
#> }
#> 
#> #ljamkajowk .gt_title {
#>   color: #000000;
#>   font-size: 125%;
#>   /* heading.title.font.size */
#>   padding-top: 4px;
#>   /* heading.top.padding */
#>   padding-bottom: 1px;
#>   border-bottom-color: #FFFFFF;
#>   border-bottom-width: 0;
#> }
#> 
#> #ljamkajowk .gt_subtitle {

#>   /* heading.bottom.padding */
#>   border-top-color: #FFFFFF;
#>   border-top-width: 0;

mtcars %>% tbl_summary(by = "am") %>% add_stat_label(iqr = FALSE)
